summary: Command‑line script that loads a Stable Diffusion pipeline (with optional textual‑inversion embedding and Intel quantization), parses user arguments, generates images from prompts, and can compose the results into a grid.
business_intent: Provide a quick, reproducible way for researchers and developers to generate AI‑created images using an optimized Stable Diffusion model, supporting textual inversion and low‑precision inference to reduce compute cost and accelerate experimentation.
